response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure that you can capitalize on this exceptional investment without delay. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing not only a valuable asset but also a competitive edge in your industry. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
